title: Free premium cable TV, Bad Credit Ok, Wi-Fi Included
posting_body: ['Siegel Slots & Suites in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Full kitchens', '-Large studio apartments', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-No long term lease required', '-On-Site Laundromat', '-Near Nellis Airforce Base and Las Vegas Motor Speedway', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free utilities included', '-Wi-Fi Included', '-Housekeeping & linen service available', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
